content: The selected disabled users will be removed from {{productName}}. This action cannot be undone.

comment.text: This translation key is used in a confirmation dialog to inform users that removing selected disabled users from an application is irreversible. It provides a descriptive message for users to review before confirming the action.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word 'zprostoru' (from 'zprostoru') in the Czech translation doesn't accurately convey the meaning of 'removed from' in the English context. It implies a freeing from a space, rather than a deletion or removal.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Vybraní zakázaní uživatelé budou z {{productName}} odstraněni.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The placement of {{productName}} in the Czech translation is not ideal. It's better to keep the placement consistent with the English version.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Vybraní zakázaní uživatelé budou z {{productName}} odstraněni.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The preposition "-sta" is attached to the product name, which looks unnatural in Finnish. It should be separated with a space.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Valitut käytöstä poistetut käyttäjät poistetaan {{productName}} -sta. Tätä toimintoa ei voi peruuttaa.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The Sinhala translation lacks the double curly braces for the `{{productName}}` placeholder as present in the English source.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Replace `{{productName}}` with `{{productName}}` in the Sinhala translation.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'මෙම ක්‍රියාමාර්ගය අප්‍රතිවර්ත්‍යයි' is a literal translation of 'This action cannot be undone' but may not be the most natural or common way to express this in Sinhala. A more common phrasing could be considered.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider replacing 'මෙම ක්‍රියාමාර්ගය අප්‍රතිවර්ත්‍යයි' with a more natural phrasing like 'මෙය කළ පසු නැවත සිදු කිරීමට නොහැකියි' or 'මේ ක්‍රියාව අවසානයේදී නැවත නොකළ යුතු'.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation adds a hyphen to productName ({{productName}}-а). This deviates from the English source and may cause display issues depending on the context.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider removing the hyphen after {{productName}}. Use '{{productName}}'. Alternatively, investigate if the hyphen is necessary for Serbian grammar and context.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The Serbian translation includes an unnecessary hyphen between 'productName' and '-a'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Izabrani onemogućeni korisnici će biti uklonjeni iz {{productName}}. Ova radnja se ne može opozvati.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation of "This action cannot be undone" is too literal. A more natural Chinese expression would convey the irreversibility of the action.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: 此操作不可逆转 (Cǐ cāozuò bùkě nìzhuǎn)

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The space before and after the full stop (period) at the end of the sentence is unnecessary and makes the sentence look slightly off.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: 所选的已禁用用户将从{{productName}}中删除。此操作不可逆转
